catalog_info.title: Latin Prose Selections (Late Antique and Medieval)
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Latin Ab, Aab, Ac, or equivalent.
catalog_info.description: Provides a bridge between study of grammar and reading of prose. After review of fundamentals, studies short selections of post-classical texts and authors such as Vulgate Bible, Augustine, Anselm of Canterbury, Abelard, and Dante.
